attributes.action: Bus Lanes in Reading should be applicable only for peak hours
attributes.background: Most of the Bus Lanes in Reading are 24 hrs and not marked. Objective of Bus Lanes are to reduce traffic for Buses and Emergency vehicles during the peak hours. So these Bus lanes should be applicable during peak hours like 8am-11am and 2pm-6pm and not 24 hrs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local bus lanes are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
